bug.author: gpengzhi
bug.summary: MultiAlignedData cannot correctly return int64 data
bug.description:
Specify data_type to be int64. Delete .long() Run sentence_classifier example.
<denchmark-code>ValueError: 'int64' is not a valid _DataType </denchmark-code>
A related issue with closed <denchmark-link:https://github.com/asyml/texar-pytorch/issues/172>#172</denchmark-link>
